attributes.action: A referendum to rejoin the EU
attributes.additional_details: The UK has been economically destroyed without the EU we have lost are biggest traiding bloc, opportunities for young people in Europe and are closeness with European allies
attributes.background: Now that 16 and 17 year olds have the right to vote it is only right that we be allowed to share are vote on a referendum we were left out of

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727964
